headline: Synopsys (SNPS) Falls More Steeply Than Broader Market: What Investors Need to Know
summary: Synopsys (SNPS) closed the most recent trading day at $480, moving 6.13% from the previous trading session.

headline: What Synopsys (SNPS)'s Co-Packaged Optics Tie-Up With Lightmatter Means For Shareholders
summary: In January 2026, Lightmatter announced a collaboration with Synopsys to integrate Synopsys’ 224G SerDes and UCIe IP for 3nm into its Passage 3D Co-Packaged Optics platform, aiming to support low-latency, high-bandwidth AI infrastructure. This pairing of silicon-proven connectivity IP with a 3D photonic engine highlights Synopsys’ role in enabling advanced electrical‑to‑optical interfaces for AI chips. We’ll now explore how this focus on co-packaged optics and high-speed connectivity may...
